title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram
materials: VVS Clarity Diamonds. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately designed floral motifs set with sparkling diamonds and vibrant green emeralds. The necklace features a graduated cascade design, leading to a larger central pendant. The setting showcases a blend of prong and pave settings to maximize diamond brilliance. The pendant features delicate gold bead dangles for added movement and elegance.
occasions: and other grand occasions. Perfect for Muhurtham
and special family gatherings. Also suitable for making a statement at high-profile events.
description: A breathtaking Haaram embodying traditional South Indian opulence with a modern flair. The exquisite combination of emeralds and diamonds symbolizes prosperity and timeless beauty. Crafted by skilled artisans, this piece is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and enduring value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a brilliant shine for years to come. This piece will become a treasured family heirloom, to be passed down from generation to generation. Its design draws inspiration from our Telugu traditions.
